teachers.title: Lewis Carroll
teachers.subtitle: Primary school English and math teacher
teachers.body: Lewis comes from England. He has over 40 years teaching experience, and he takes a keen interest in artwork.

teachers.title: Pablo Picasso
teachers.subtitle: Trainee art teacher
teachers.body: Pablo comes from southern Spain, but he has been living in a bottle of absinthe for the last two years.

teachers.title: Albert Einstein
teachers.subtitle: Janitor
teachers.body: After getting very poor grades at school, Albert could not aspire to anything more than cleaning the school, which he does satisfactorily.
